quoteText: <li>restrict, inhibit, or otherwise interfere with the ability of any other person, regardless of intent, purpose or knowledge, to use or enjoy the Comcast Web Services (except for tools for safety and security functions such as parental controls, for example), including, without limitation, posting or transmitting any information or software which contains a worm, virus, or other harmful feature, or generating levels of traffic sufficient to impede others' ability to use, send, or retrieve information;
title: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

tosdr.case: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
